message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product! It's a unique opportunity to own a truly exceptional item. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1400000. This is a great price considering its value and rarity. I'm confident you'll love it!

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value and rarity of the product you're offering. However, given my budget constraints, I am only able to consider offers within the range of $1350000 to $1375000. I hope we can find common ground.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand your budget constraints, and I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm counteroffering at $1395000. This is a fair price considering the product's value and rarity. I'm confident we can come to an agreement.
